short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop phishing attempts at the point of click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Phishing websites trick you into sharing your most sensitive data by imitating companies you trust. PIXM uses artificial intelligence to secure your browser and stop phishing in real-time. Our technology visually analyzes websites to instantly determine if a page is using an unauthorized domain/URL to impersonate a legitimate company. When we identify malicious pages we’ll block them, so you don’t inadvertently submit your data to a phishing website.

What you’ll get: 

Block zero-day phishing attacks
Our technology scans web pages when you click them and uses artificial intelligence to identify and block new attacks.  

Phishing prevention when you click
Get protection regardless of the source of attack. Any email, social media message, or business collaboration link will be scanned the moment it's clicked.
Frictionless installation
Getting started is easy, just install the extension in your browser.  For enterprise customers, you can deploy PIXM across your organization in minutes with any RMM system.

PIXM’s award-winning deep learning approach has been featured in Wired, CSO Online, and Bloomberg and has stopped hundreds of targeted phishing attacks that evaded other security products.. Learn more - https://pixmsecurity.com

By installing the extension, you agree to PIXM’s Terms of Use - https://pixm.net/terms-of-use/.
